name: Durian Season Rumble Arena
description:
*THIS IS A 2 PLAYER GAME MADE FOR INDIES VS PEWDIEPIE* 72 hours game jam!

#indiesvspewdiepie

This is a battle between 2 creatures, struggling to get the most delicious 'Asian' level fruit for humanity, or for survivality of the monster. Get 4 points to win!

You need 2 players to play the game. Get the fruit, and bring it to your base!

We really appreciate if you could vote for our game in another indie game website - http://bit.ly/1ttr46b

It really helps us!
